overview_of_class: The study of globalization involves an understanding of the interconnectedness of cultures and societies geographically wide apart. Through a combination of ethnographies, journal articles, and films, the course will explore the lives of youth in the Middle East and Asia. It seeks to uncover different ways in which youth in the global south are engaged in exchanges of goods, ideas, and money with other people around the world, thereby becoming global citizens.
name: Topics in Sociology
topic: Globalization & the Youth: Persp from Global South
subject: SOCIOL
